law.text: Members of the Judicial Retirement and Removal Commission who do not otherwise receive a salary from the State Treasury shall receive sixty dollars ($60) for each day they are in session or on official duty. All members shall be reimbursed for their necessary expenses for each day they are in session or on official duty. All claims shall be approved by the Chief Justice or his designee and shall be paid out of the State Treasury.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 4, effective March 23, 1976.
